section.p: You notice an old tomb covered in vines and creepers. Sweeping the vegetation away you reveal a plaque that reads: 'Here lies Kizil Irmak, war prophet of the holy armies of Ebron'.
You have found the last resting place of Kizil Irmak, wielder of the Holy Avenger, the sword that the High Convener of Chariots in Aku wanted you to find for her.
